## nysdoh_sepsisr

The `nysdoh_sepsisr` package provides functions to calculate a variety of items
   based on data abstraction required by NYSDOH

1. Time to First Lactate
2. 
1. SAPS II

## Installation

The `icuriskr` package can be installed from GitHub using the `devtools` package
and the following commands:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)

install_github("gbriddick\nysdoh_sepsisr")
```
